comments: Only reason I rated this difficult is because its your thesis.  The entire class is just your thesis, Thomas is a great resource for help and guidance.
Be prepared for the ride of your academic career....

Thomas is the most insightful and considerate person you'll meet. He helped me immensely on my thesis. You definitely need to be proactive in this class, but as long as you reach out for help you'll get it.
If you're writing a thesis, take this course. I could not have finished without the structure, feedback and motivation it provided.
